text: Merwin Coad (born September 28, 1924) is an American politician. He was a Democratic U.S. Representative from Iowa's 6th congressional district for six years, serving from January 1957 to January 1963. ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Iowa Category:Politicians from Kansas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Merwin Coad
